      • calculateTargets

        public java.util.HashMap<Fortress,Tile> calculateTargets(Map mapData)
        Finds all the tiles on a given map that are in range of the Fortress Team And Filters the tiles for only one that have Fire Engines
        Parameters:
        mapData - the map you want to check for targets on
        Returns:
        returns a hashMap with the Tiles that are accepted\n Key: The Fortress Value: The Tile that it can hit
